info.title: Deprivation Scores API
info.description: UK census data, especially Index of Multiple Deprivation, as a service.

get.description:
This is a proxy for postcodes.io, an api that looks up a given postcode
and returns LSOA code, CCG code and other important codes information

parameters.name: postcode
parameters.description: Postcode for postcodes.io

get.description:
This endpoint returns a list of LSOAs in England and Wales.

Filter Parameters:

`year`

`lsoa_code`

`lsoa_name`

If none are passed, a list is returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

get.description:
This endpoint returns a list of LSOAs in England and Wales.

Filter Parameters:

`year`

`lsoa_code`

`lsoa_name`

If none are passed, a list is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this ('LSOA',).

get.description:
This endpoint returns a list of all English LSOAs with the associated deprivation rank and quintiles, as well as the rank and quintile of all the associated deprivation domains (2019).

Filter Parameters:

`lsoa_code`

If none are passed, a list is returned

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

get.description:
This endpoint returns a list of all English LSOAs with the associated deprivation rank and quintiles, as well as the rank and quintile of all the associated deprivation domains (2019).

Filter Parameters:

`lsoa_code`

If none are passed, a list is returned

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this english index multiple deprivation.

get.description: This endpoint returns a list of local authorities in the UK with data relating to green space and access to green space.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

get.description: This endpoint returns a list of local authorities in the UK with data relating to green space and access to green space.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this green space.

get.description:
This endpoint returns an Index of Multiple Deprivations against a postcode, from either England, Wales, Scotland or Northern Ireland.

Parameters:

`postcode`: string **[Mandatory]**

`quantile`: integer **[Mandatory]**, one of [2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 18, 20]

parameters.name: postcode
parameters.description: Postcode

parameters.name: quantile
parameters.description: Quantile

get.description:
This endpoint returns an index of multiple deprivations against a postcode, from either England, Wales, Scotland or Northern Ireland.

Parameters:

`postcode`: string **[Mandatory]**

parameters.name: postcode
parameters.description: Postcode

get.description:
This endpoint returns a list of Local Authority Districts (2019) across England, Scotland and Wales.

Filter Parameters:

`year`

`local_authority_district_code`

`local_authority_district_name`

If none are passed, a list is returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

get.description:
This endpoint returns a list of Local Authority Districts (2019) across England, Scotland and Wales.

Filter Parameters:

`year`

`local_authority_district_code`

`local_authority_district_name`

If none are passed, a list is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this ('Local Authority',).

get.description:
This endpoint returns a list of all Northern Ireland SOAs with the associated deprivation rank and quintiles, as well as the rank and quintile of all the associated deprivation domains (2020).

Filter Parameters:

`soa_code`

If none are passed, a list is returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

get.description:
This endpoint returns a list of all Scottish data zones (2011) and their associated local authority district.

Filter Parameters:

`year`

`data_zone_code`

`data_zone_name`

If none are passed, a list is returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

get.description:
